| History                 = Initially Brand was a completely-owned subsidiary of [[Roxxon Energy Corporation (Earth-616)|Roxxon Oil]].{{r|Peter Parker, The Spectacular Spider-Man Vol 1 57}}

[[Henry McCoy (Earth-616)|Hank McCoy]] was hired as a researcher for the Brand Corporation, besides [[Carl Maddicks (Earth-616)|Carl Maddicks]] and [[Linda Donaldson (Earth-616)|Linda Donaldson]]. Maddicks and Donaldson attempted to steal McCoy's research, but they failed, and McCoy drank a serum of his own creation that transformed him into a furry beast.{{r|Amazing Adventures Vol 2 11}}

[[Anthony Stark (Earth-616)|Tony Stark]] and his assistant [[Marianne Rodgers (Earth-616)|Marianne Rodgers]] toured the facility. Stark came across the Beast as Iron Man, until they were engaged by members of Brand security.{{r|Amazing Adventures Vol 2 12}}
